entry.content:
ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ª nÂ Ã—Â n çš„äºŒç»´çŸ©é˜µÂ matrix è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªå›¾åƒã€‚è¯·ä½ å°†å›¾åƒé¡ºæ—¶é’ˆæ—‹è½¬ 90 åº¦ã€‚
ä½ å¿…é¡»åœ¨ åŸåœ° æ—‹è½¬å›¾åƒï¼Œè¿™æ„å‘³ç€ä½ éœ€è¦ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹è¾“å…¥çš„äºŒç»´çŸ©é˜µã€‚è¯·ä¸è¦ ä½¿ç”¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µæ¥æ—‹è½¬å›¾åƒã€‚

é“¾æ¥ï¼šåŸé¢˜è¿æ¥

æ€è·¯ 1

  1. å…ˆæŠŠæ¯ä¸€è¡Œéƒ½ç¿»è½¬ï¼šå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€è¡Œï¼Œå¤´å°¾è°ƒæ¢ï¼Œç›´åˆ°ä¸­ä½æ•°i=len/2
  2. å¯¹è§’çº¿å¯¹æ¢ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œå’Œç¬¬å››åˆ—çš„å¯¹æ¢ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒè¡Œå’Œç¬¬ä¸‰åˆ—çš„å¯¹æ¢ã€‚å¦‚å›¾ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œåœ¨ï¼ˆ1ï¼Œ3ï¼‰å¯¹æ¢åœæ­¢ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒè¡Œåœ¨ï¼ˆ2ï¼Œ2ï¼‰å¯¹æ¢åœæ­¢ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å¦ä¸€æ¡å¯¹è§’çº¿ä¸Šçš„ä¸ç”¨å˜ã€‚
class Solution {
        public void rotate(int[][] matrix) {
        int len = matrix[0].length;

        // æ¯è¡Œç¿»è½¬
        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < len/2; j++) {
                int temp = matrix[i][j];
                matrix[i][j] = matrix[i][len-1-j];
                matrix[i][len-1-j] = temp;
            }
        }

        // å¯¹è§’çº¿å¯¹æ¢
        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
            int j = len-1-i;
            for (int u = 0; u < len-i; u++) {
                int temp = matrix[i][u];
                matrix[i][u] = matrix[len-1-u][j];
                matrix[len-1-u][j] = temp;
            }

        }
    }
}

æ€»ç»“

å“‡ï¼å®Œå…¨é è‡ªå·±æƒ³å‡ºæ¥çš„æœ€ä¼˜è§£ï½è¶…è¿‡100%ï¼Œå¥½å¼€å¿ƒï¼ï¼â¤ï¸
åŠ æ²¹åŠ æ²¹ ä¸ç°å¿ƒä¸æ”¾å¼ƒ æˆ‘è¡Œæˆ‘ä¼šæˆ‘å¯ä»¥ï¼ï¼

entry.title: â¤ï¸ GREæ€»ç»“
ğŸ–¤ LeetCode Dailyï½œåˆçº§ç®—æ³•(2)-æ•°ç‹¬æœ‰æ•ˆæ€§éªŒè¯ã€mediumã€‘
entry.content:
è¯·ä½ åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªÂ 9x9 çš„æ•°ç‹¬æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚åªéœ€è¦ æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸‹è§„åˆ™ ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å·²ç»å¡«å…¥çš„æ•°å­—æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆå³å¯ã€‚
æ•°å­—Â 1-9Â åœ¨æ¯ä¸€è¡Œåªèƒ½å‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚
æ•°å­—Â 1-9Â åœ¨æ¯ä¸€åˆ—åªèƒ½å‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚
æ•°å­—Â 1-9Â åœ¨æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»¥ç²—å®çº¿åˆ†éš”çš„Â 3x3Â å®«å†…åªèƒ½å‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚ï¼ˆè¯·å‚è€ƒç¤ºä¾‹å›¾ï¼‰
æ•°ç‹¬éƒ¨åˆ†ç©ºæ ¼å†…å·²å¡«å…¥äº†æ•°å­—ï¼Œç©ºç™½æ ¼ç”¨Â '.'Â è¡¨ç¤ºã€‚

æ³¨æ„ï¼š
ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ•°ç‹¬ï¼ˆéƒ¨åˆ†å·²è¢«å¡«å……ï¼‰ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å¯è§£çš„ã€‚
åªéœ€è¦æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸Šè§„åˆ™ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å·²ç»å¡«å…¥çš„æ•°å­—æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆå³å¯ã€‚

é“¾æ¥ï¼šåŸé¢˜é“¾æ¥

  • æœ€æœ´ç´ çš„æƒ³æ³•ã€è¿‡äºæš´åŠ›äº†ã€‘
  • ä¼˜åŒ–å
  • æ€»ç»“

æœ€æœ´ç´ çš„æƒ³æ³•ã€è¿‡äºæš´åŠ›äº†ã€‘

è¾“å…¥çš„æ˜¯äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œ

  • å–å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œï¼Œéå†a[1][i]; å–å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯"."ï¼Œå°†å…¶æ·»åŠ è¿›HashMapï¼Œå¦‚æœå·²å­˜åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›æ— æ•ˆï¼›
  • åŒç†éå†a[j][1]ã€‚
  • éå†å°æ ¼å­ï¼Œä¸€å…±ä¹ä¸ª(3 x 3)ï¼Œ
    • ç¬¬1ä¸ªå°æ ¼å­(0, 0)åŒ…æ‹¬a[0][0-2],a[1][0-2],a[2][0-2];
    • ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå°æ ¼å­(0, 1) åŒ…æ‹¬a[0][0+3j, 1 + 3j, 2 + 3j],a[1][0+3j, 1 + 3j, 2 + 3j],a[2][0+3j, 1 + 3j, 2 + 3j]; ï¼Œj=1
    • ä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ï¼Œç¬¬ï¼ˆiï¼Œjï¼‰ä¸ªæ ¼å­åŒ…æ‹¬a[0+3i, 1 + 3i, 2 + 3i][0+3j, 1 + 3j, 2 + 3j]ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¼å­ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œä¸€é1-9å‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­ã€‚
  • ç”±äº1-9å‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­åœ¨æ¯ä¸€æ­¥éƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°ï¼Œå•ç‹¬å†™æˆå‡½æ•°ã€‚
    è¡Œã€åˆ—ã€å°æ ¼å­å„éå†ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼ˆå¤æ‚åº¦å¾ˆé«˜ã€ç”¨äº†ä¸åˆé€‚çš„HashMapï¼‰ï¼š
import org.junit.Test;

import java.util.HashMap;

public class SudokoTest {
        public boolean isValidSudoku(char[][] board) {

            char blank = '.';
            //è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­
            for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++){
                HashMap map = new HashMap();
                for(int j = 0; j < 9; j++){
                    System.out.print(board[i][j]);
                    if (board[i][j] != blank){
                        if (map.get(board[i][j]) != null){
                            return false;
                        }
                    }
                    map.put(board[i][j],1);
                }
            }
            System.out.println("Here1>>>>>>>>>>>");
            //åˆ—åˆ¤æ–­
            for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++){
                HashMap map = new HashMap();
                for(int j = 0; j < 9; j++){
                    System.out.print(board[j][i]);
                    if (board[j][i] != blank){
                        if (map.get(board[j][i]) != null){
                            return false;
                        }
                    }
                    map.put(board[j][i],1);
                }
            }

            System.out.println("Here2>>>>>>>>>>>");
            //å°æ ¼å­åˆ¤æ–­

            for(int u = 0; u < 3; u++){
                for (int v = 0; v < 3; v++) {
                    //ç¬¬uï¼Œvä¸ªæ ¼å­
                    HashMap map3 = new HashMap();

                    for(int i = 0+3*u; i < 3+3*u; i++){
                        for(int j = 0+3*v; j < 3+3*v; j++){
                            if (board[i][j] != blank){
                                if (map3.get(board[i][j]) != null){
                                    return false;
                                }
                                    map3.put(board[i][j],1);
                            }

                        }
                    }
                    System.out.println("Another<<<");
                }
                System.out.println("next line<<<");
            }

            System.out.println("Here");
            return true;
        }

        @Test
        public void test(){
            char[][] testChar = new char[][]{{'5', '3', '7', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'1', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '9', '8', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '1', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.'},
                    {'.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '.', '9', '4'}};

            System.out.println(isValidSudoku(testChar));
        }
    }

ä¼˜åŒ–å

æ˜¾ç„¶è¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦å’Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦éƒ½å¾ˆé«˜ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è¦newä¸€ä¸ªHashMapï¼Œè¦åˆ†ä¸‰æ¬¡updateï¼Œä¸å¯å–ã€‚
é¦–å…ˆè€ƒè™‘éå†ä¸€æ¬¡è®°å½•ä¸‹ä¸‰ä¸ªç›®æ ‡çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
å»ºç«‹ä¸‰ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼š

  • row[i][num]:è¡¨ç¤ºiè¡Œçš„numçš„æ•°é‡
  • col[j][num]:è¡¨ç¤ºjè¡Œçš„numçš„æ•°é‡
  • box[j/3 + i/3*3]ï¼šè¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬j/3 + i/3*3ä¸ªå°æ ¼å­ä¸­çš„numçš„æ•°é‡

WHY j/3 + i/3 * 3ï¼Ÿ
j/3è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬j/3åˆ†åˆ—çš„æ ¼å­
i/3è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬i/3åˆ†è¡Œçš„æ ¼å­
æ»¡3ä¸ªè¦å¾€ä¸‹ç§»ä¸‰è¡Œï¼Œæ•…*3

class Solution {
    public boolean isValidSudoku(char[][] board) {
            int[][] row = new int[9][10];
            int[][] col = new int[9][10];
            int[][] box = new int[9][10];

            for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++){
                for(int j = 0; j < 9; j++){
                    if(board[i][j] == '.'){
                        continue;
                    }

                    int num = board[i][j] - '1';

                    if(row[i][num] == 1){
                        return false;
                    }

                    if(col[j][num] == 1){
                        return false;
                    }
                    
                    if(box[j/3 + i/3 * 3][num] == 1){
                        return false;
                    }
                    row[i][num] = 1;
                    col[j][num] = 1;
                    box[j/3 + i/3 * 3][num] = 1;
                }
            }
            return true;
    }
}

æ€»ç»“

  • éš¾ç‚¹åœ¨äºå¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªåˆ†å—ï¼šj/3 + i/3 * ä¸‹ç§»çš„è¡Œæ•°ã€‚
  • æ•°å­—å°‘ä¸”ç¡®å®šæ—¶ç”¨æ•°ç»„å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œä¸ç”¨HashMapã€‚æœ¬é¢˜ä¸­ç”±ä¸¤ä¸ªå€¼ç¡®å®škeyçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œä¸é€‚åˆç”¨HashMapã€‚
  • é€‰æ‹©æ•°æ®ç»“æ„çš„æ—¶å€™ä¸è¦è¢«é™åˆ¶ä½äº†ã€‚

entry.title: ğŸ§¡ Javaç»ƒä¹ ï½œç»ƒä¹ TreeMapçš„Comparatorã€Comparableæ¥å£
entry.content:
æœ‰8ä¸ªæ˜¾ç¤ºå™¨ï¼Œå…¶å±æ€§æœ‰å°ºå¯¸å’Œä»·æ ¼ã€‚ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªJavaåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºï¼Œä½¿ç”¨TreeMap<K,V>ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ä»·æ ¼ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åºè¾“å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰æ˜¾ç¤ºå™¨çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¦æ±‚é€šè¿‡ä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼å®ç°ï¼šé€šè¿‡å®ç°Comparatoræ¥å£å’Œé€šè¿‡å®ç°Comparableæ¥å£ã€‚

ç¨‹åºåˆ†æ

TreeMapç‰¹æ€§

  1. TreeMapå­˜å‚¨Key-Value å¯¹æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ ¹æ®key-valueå¯¹è¿›è¡Œæ’åºã€‚TreeMapå¯ä»¥ä¿è¯æ‰€æœ‰çš„Key-Value å¯¹å¤„äºæœ‰åºçŠ¶æ€ã€‚
  2. TreeSetåº•å±‚ä½¿ç”¨çº¢é»‘æ ‘ç»“æ„å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®

TreeMapçš„Keyçš„æ’åºï¼š

  • è‡ªç„¶æ’åºï¼šTreeMapçš„æ‰€æœ‰çš„Key å¿…é¡»å®ç°Comparableæ¥å£ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ‰€æœ‰çš„Keyåº”è¯¥æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å°†ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºClasssCastException
  • å®šåˆ¶æ’åºï¼šåˆ›å»ºTreeMapæ—¶ï¼Œä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªComparator å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¯¥å¯¹è±¡è´Ÿè´£å¯¹TreeMapä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰key è¿›è¡Œæ’åºã€‚æ­¤æ—¶ä¸éœ€è¦Map çš„Keyå®ç°Comparable æ¥å£
  • TreeMapåˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªkeyç›¸ç­‰çš„æ ‡å‡†ï¼šä¸¤ä¸ªkeyé€šè¿‡compareTo()æ–¹æ³•æˆ–è€…compare()æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›0ã€‚

æ–¹æ³•1ï¼ŒScreenå®ç°Comparableæ¥å£

  1. Screenå…ˆå£°æ˜fieldsï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬privateç±»å‹çš„sizeã€priceï¼Œå®šä¹‰constructorã€setterã€gettingã€é‡å†™toString()
  2. å®ç°Comparableæ¥å£ï¼Œé‡å†™compareTo()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
  • åˆ¤æ–­ä¼ å…¥çš„å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯Screençš„ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯ï¼š
  • å–å‡ºå®ä¾‹ä¸­çš„priceè¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¤§äºä¸º-1ï¼Œå°äºä¸º1ï¼Œç›¸ç­‰ä¸º0
  • å¦åˆ™ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼šæ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ã€‚
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Screen implements Comparable{
   private int size;
   private double price;

   public Screen(int size, double price) {
       this.size = size;
       this.price = price;
   }

   public int getSize() {
       return size;
   }

   public void setSize(int size) {
       this.size = size;
   }

   public double getPrice() {
       return price;
   }

   public void setPrice(double price) {
       this.price = price;
   }

   @Override
   public String toString() {
       return "Screen{" +
               " size='" + size + '\'' +
               ", price=" + price +
               '}';
   }

   @Override
   public int compareTo(Object o) {
       if(o instanceof Screen){
           Screen screen = (Screen) o;
           if(this.price > screen.price){
               return -1;
           }else if (this.price < screen.price){
               return 1;
           }else return 0;
       }
       throw new RuntimeException("ä¼ å…¥çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼");
   }
}
  • æµ‹è¯•
  1. å®ä¾‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªTreeMap inventoryå’Œå…«ä¸ªscreen
  2. å°† screenæ”¾å…¥inventory
  3. è°ƒç”¨treemapä¸­çš„entrySetï¼Œèµ‹ç»™Set entrySetï¼Œæ¥ç€è°ƒç”¨entrySetçš„interatorè¿›è¡Œè¿­ä»£ã€‚
  4. åœ¨iteratorä¸­ï¼Œå°†iterator.nextå¼ºåˆ¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºMap.Entryï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨.getKey(), .getValue()æ–¹æ³•è¾“å‡ºkeyå’Œvalueã€‚
    @Test
    public void testComparable(){
        TreeMap inventory= new TreeMap();

        Screen screen1 = new Screen(100,2111);
        Screen screen2 = new Screen(200,2112);
        Screen screen3 = new Screen(200,1113);
        Screen screen4 = new Screen(100,9141);
        Screen screen5 = new Screen(100,3151);
        Screen screen6 = new Screen(100,3611);
        Screen screen7 = new Screen(100,2711);
        Screen screen8 = new Screen(100,8111);

        inventory.put(screen1, screen1.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen2, screen2.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen3, screen3.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen4, screen4.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen5, screen5.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen6, screen6.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen7, screen7.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen8, screen8.getPrice());

        Set entrySet = inventory.entrySet();
        Iterator iterator = entrySet.iterator();
        while (iterator.hasNext()){
            Object obj = iterator.next();
            Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) obj;
            System.out.println(entry.getKey()+"--->"+entry.getValue());
        }
    }
  • ç»“æœ

æ–¹æ³•2ï¼ŒTreeMapå®ç°Comparator

  1. Screen2çš„åŸºæœ¬è®¾ç½®å’ŒScreenç›¸åŒï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸å®ç°Comparableæ¥å£

  2. åœ¨åˆ›å»ºinventoryæ—¶ï¼Œå†™å…¥comparator
    åœ¨TreeMapä¸­new Comparatorï¼Œé‡å†™å…¶ä¸­çš„ compare()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

  • é¦–å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­ä¼ å…¥çš„o1ï¼Œo2æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºScreen2çš„å®ä¾‹
  • å¦‚æœæ˜¯ï¼Œå°†å…¶è½¬å‹ä¸ºScreen2
  • ç„¶åè°ƒç”¨Double.compareæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤è€…çš„price
  • å¦åˆ™ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼šæ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ã€‚
    @Test
    public void testComparator(){
        TreeMap inventory= new TreeMap(new Comparator() {
            @Override
            public int compare(Object o1, Object o2) {
                if (o1 instanceof Screen2 && o2 instanceof Screen2){
                    Screen2 screen1 = (Screen2) o1;
                    Screen2 screen2 = (Screen2) o2;

                    return -Double.compare(screen1.getPrice(), screen2.getPrice());
                }
                throw new RuntimeException("è¾“å…¥çš„ç±»å‹ä¸åŒ¹é…ï¼");
            }
        });
        Screen2 screen1 = new Screen2(100,6111);
        Screen2 screen2 = new Screen2(200,2112);
        Screen2 screen3 = new Screen2(240,1113);
        Screen2 screen4 = new Screen2(150,9141);
        Screen2 screen5 = new Screen2(120,3151);
        Screen2 screen6 = new Screen2(110,3611);
        Screen2 screen7 = new Screen2(400,2711);
        Screen2 screen8 = new Screen2(600,8111);

        inventory.put(screen1, screen1.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen2, screen2.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen3, screen3.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen4, screen4.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen5, screen5.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen6, screen6.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen7, screen7.getPrice());
        inventory.put(screen8, screen8.getPrice());

        Set entrySet = inventory.entrySet();
        Iterator iterator = entrySet.iterator();
        while (iterator.hasNext()){
            Object obj = iterator.next();
            Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) obj;
            System.out.println(entry.getKey()+"--->"+entry.getValue());
        }
    }
  • ç»“æœ

entry.content:
å¼ ä¸‰ã€æå››ç­‰äººæ˜¯Aç¤¾å›¢æˆå‘˜ï¼Œæå››ã€ç‹äº”ç­‰äººæ˜¯Bç¤¾å›¢æˆå‘˜ï¼Œç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªJavaåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºï¼ˆè¦æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨é›†åˆç±»ï¼‰ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºå‚åŠ Aç¤¾å›¢çš„äººã€å‚åŠ Bç¤¾å›¢çš„äººã€ä»¥åŠåŒæ—¶å‚åŠ ä¸¤ä¸ªç¤¾å›¢çš„äººã€‚

ç¨‹åºåˆ†æï¼š

  • éœ€è¦å»ºç«‹çš„ç±»ï¼šç¤¾å›¢ç±»ã€å­¦ç”Ÿç±»

  • å­¦ç”ŸPersonç±»FieldåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šå­¦ç”Ÿå§“å

  • æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
    1. è¾“å‡ºå‚åŠ æŸç¤¾å›¢çš„äºº
    å°†æˆå‘˜åŠ å…¥ç¤¾å›¢ï¼Œå†™ä¸€ä¸ªaddæ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥privateç±»å‹çš„ç¤¾å›¢å¯¹è±¡ï¼›
    å±•ç¤ºè¯¥ç¤¾å›¢ä¸­çš„æˆå‘˜ï¼Œç”¨iteratoré€ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºcommunityé›†åˆä¸­çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ³¨æ„é‡å†™Personä¸­çš„toString()ï¼›

2. è¾“å‡ºåŒæ—¶å‚åŠ ä¸¤ä¸ªç¤¾å›¢çš„äºº
éœ€è¦è®¡ç®—ä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆä¸­çš„äº¤é›†ï¼Œå¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œéå†å…¶ä¸­çš„Personï¼Œå’Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆé€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå°†ç›¸åŒçš„åŠ å…¥intersectioné›†åˆä¸­ã€‚è¿™é‡Œè¦æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªObjectï¼ˆPersonï¼‰å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦é‡å†™Personä¸­çš„equals()ã€‚

ä»£ç 

  • Person
public class Person {
    private String name;

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public Person(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Person{" +
                "name='" + name + '\'' +
                '}';
    }

    @Override
    public boolean equals(Object o) {
        if (this == o) return true;
        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
        Person person = (Person) o;
        return Objects.equals(name, person.name);
    }

    @Override
    public int hashCode() {
        return Objects.hash(name);
    }
}
  • Community
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Iterator;

public class Community {
    private String name;
    private ArrayList<Person> community = new ArrayList<Person>();

    public Community(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public ArrayList<Person> getCommunity() {
        return community;
    }

    public void add(Person person) {
        community.add(person);
    }

    public void show() {
        System.out.println("å‚åŠ ç¤¾å›¢"+name+"çš„å­¦ç”Ÿï¼š");
        Iterator iterator = community.iterator();
        while (iterator.hasNext()) {
            System.out.println(iterator.next());
        }
    }

    public ArrayList<Person> intersect(Community another){
        ArrayList<Person> intersection = new ArrayList<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < community.size(); i++){
            for (int j = 0; j < another.getCommunity().size(); j++){
                if(community.get(i).equals(another.getCommunity().get(j))){
                       intersection.add(community.get(i));
                }
            }
        }
        return intersection;
    }

    public void showIntersection(Community another){
        System.out.println("å‚åŠ è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªç¤¾å›¢çš„å­¦ç”Ÿï¼š");
        ArrayList<Person> intersection = intersect(another);
        Iterator iterator = intersection.iterator();
        while (iterator.hasNext()){
            System.out.println(iterator.next());
        }
    }
}
  • Test
public class CommunityTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        Community communityA = new Community("ç¤¾å›¢A");
        Community communityB = new Community("ç¤¾å›¢B");

        Person zhangSan = new Person("Zhang San");
        Person liSi = new Person("Li Si");
        Person wangWu = new Person("Wang Wu");

        communityA.add(zhangSan);
        communityA.add(liSi);
        communityB.add(liSi);
        communityB.add(wangWu);

        communityA.show();
        communityB.show();

        communityA.showIntersection(communityB);

    }
}

entry.title: ğŸ–¤ LeetCode Dailyï½œåˆçº§ç®—æ³•(1)-ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œã€easyã€‘
entry.content:
ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ nums å’Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ç›®æ ‡å€¼ targetï¼Œè¯·ä½ åœ¨è¯¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾å‡º å’Œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å€¼ target çš„é‚£ ä¸¤ä¸ª æ•´æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å®ƒä»¬çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ã€‚

ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾æ¯ç§è¾“å…¥åªä¼šå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæ•°ç»„ä¸­åŒä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åœ¨ç­”æ¡ˆé‡Œä¸èƒ½é‡å¤å‡ºç°ã€‚

ä½ å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ä»»æ„é¡ºåºè¿”å›ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

é“¾æ¥ï¼šåŸé¢˜é“¾æ¥

  • ç”¨HashMapæˆ–åŒæŒ‡é’ˆåšã€‚
  • æ€è·¯æ˜¯ï¼šå¦‚æœèƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç›¸åŠ å¾—targetçš„æ•°ï¼Œé‚£å°±æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ˆkeyï¼‰çš„valueè¿”å›ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ”¾å…¥HashMapä¸­ã€‚
class Solution {
    public int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) {
        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap();
        for(int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++){
            if(map.get(target - nums[i]) != null){
                return new int[]{map.get(target - nums[i]), i};
            }
            map.put(nums[i], i);
        }
        return new int[]{0,0};
    }
}

  • Bug1ï¼š
    ä¸€å¼€å§‹æƒ³ç”¨äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾æ¥æ‰¾ï¼ˆtarget - nums[i]ï¼‰ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™å°±è¦æ±‚ä¸€å¼€å§‹è¦æ’åºã€‚
    é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚è¾“å‡ºçš„æ˜¯ç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®ï¼Œç”¨è¿™ç§æ€è·¯çš„è¯å°±è¦æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ”¾è¿›å»ã€‚è€ŒJavaä¸­å°†ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„èµ‹ç»™å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨å½¢å¼èµ‹è¿‡å»çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åŸæ•°ç»„é¡ºåºå˜äº†æ–°çš„æ•°ç»„é¡ºåºä¹Ÿä¼šå˜ã€‚é‡æ–°ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªforå¾ªç¯èµ‹è¿›å»åˆå¾ˆéº»çƒ¦ï¼Œè¦å†ä¸€æ¬¡æ‰¾indexï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿˜è¦ä¸€æ¬¡é¡ºåºæ‰¾indexä¸€æ¬¡é€†åºæ‰¾indexï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚[3,3]ï¼Œ6ï¼Œè¦å¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯[0,1]ï¼Œåªç”¨é¡ºåºæŸ¥æ‰¾çš„è¯å°±ä¼šè¾“å‡º[0,0]ï¼‰

  • Bug2:
    å°èªæ˜æƒ³ç€é‚£æˆ‘ä»æ¯”targetå°çš„æ•°å¼€å§‹æ‰¾å¥½äº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°‘æ‰¾ä¸€äº›ã€‚ä½†æ²¡è€ƒè™‘åˆ°æµ‹è¯•æ•°ç»„ä¸­å­˜åœ¨[-3,1,4]è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¦‚æœtarget==1ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå‡ºé”™äº†ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸å¯é¿å…è¦å…¨éƒ¨éå†ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

ğŸ‰â€œå¾®ä¹ æƒ¯â€å…»æˆè®°ï¼šStart From Littleã€‚å°±ä»æ¯å¤©è‡³å°‘ä¸€é“LeetCodeå¼€å§‹å§ï¼
ï¼ˆä»Šå¤©å†™äº†ä¸‰é“ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™é“æ¯”è¾ƒæœ‰è®°å½•çš„æ„ä¹‰å•¦ï½åŠ æ²¹ï¼ï¼‰

entry.title: ğŸ’™ JDBC(2)ï½œ SQLè¯­å¥æ³¨å…¥-Statement/PreparedStatement
entry.content:
Statementæ“ä½œçš„å¼Šç«¯

  • éœ€è¦æ‹¼å†™sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œå¹¶å­˜åœ¨sqlæ³¨å…¥é—®é¢˜
  • sqlæ³¨å…¥é—®é¢˜ï¼šåˆ©ç”¨æŸäº›ç³»ç»Ÿæ²¡æœ‰å¯¹ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œå……åˆ†çš„æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œè€Œåœ¨ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®ä¸­æ³¨å…¥éæ³•çš„SQLè¯­å¥æ®µæˆ–å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œä»è€Œåˆ©ç”¨ç³»ç»Ÿçš„SQLå¼•æ“å®Œæˆæ¶æ„è¡Œä¸ºçš„åšæ³•ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ï¼ŒSELECT user, password FROM user_table WHERE user = 'a' OR = 1 =' AND password = 'OR '1' = '1'ï¼‰ã€‚
  • ä¸ºäº†é¿å…è¿™ä¸€é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ç”¨Prepared Statementï¼ˆä»Statementæ‰©å±•è€Œæ¥ï¼‰å–ä»£Statement
public class StatementTest {
    //ä½¿ç”¨Statementçš„å¼Šç«¯ï¼šéœ€è¦æ‹¼å†™sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œå¹¶å­˜åœ¨sqlæ³¨å…¥çš„é—®é¢˜
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);

        System.out.println("username:");
        String user = scanner.next();
        System.out.println("password:");
        String password = scanner.next();

        String sql = "SELECT user, password FROM user_table WHERE user = '"+ user +"' AND password = '"+ password +"'";
        User returnUser = get(sql, User.class);
        if(returnUser != null){
            System.out.println("ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ");
        }
        else{
            System.out.println("ç”¨æˆ·åä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯");
        }
    }

    // ä½¿ç”¨Statementå®ç°å¯¹æ•°æ®è¡¨çš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ“ä½œ
    public static <T> T get(String sql, Class<T> clazz) {
        T t = null;

        Connection conn = null;
        Statement st = null;
        ResultSet rs = null;
        try {
            // 1.åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
            InputStream is = StatementTest.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");
            Properties pros = new Properties();
            pros.load(is);

            // 2.è¯»å–é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
            String user = pros.getProperty("user");
            String password = pros.getProperty("password");
            String url = pros.getProperty("url");
            String driverClass = pros.getProperty("driverClass");

            // 3.åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨
            Class.forName(driverClass);

            // 4.è·å–è¿æ¥
            conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);

            st = conn.createStatement();

            rs = st.executeQuery(sql);

            // è·å–ç»“æœé›†çš„å…ƒæ•°æ®
            ResultSetMetaData rsmd = rs.getMetaData();

            // è·å–ç»“æœé›†çš„åˆ—æ•°
            int columnCount = rsmd.getColumnCount();

            if (rs.next()) {

                t = clazz.newInstance();

                for (int i = 0; i < columnCount; i++) {
                    // //1. è·å–åˆ—çš„åç§°
                    // String columnName = rsmd.getColumnName(i+1);

                    // 1. è·å–åˆ—çš„åˆ«å
                    String columnName = rsmd.getColumnLabel(i + 1);

                    // 2. æ ¹æ®åˆ—åè·å–å¯¹åº”æ•°æ®è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®
                    Object columnVal = rs.getObject(columnName);

                    // 3. å°†æ•°æ®è¡¨ä¸­å¾—åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°è£…è¿›å¯¹è±¡
                    Field field = clazz.getDeclaredField(columnName);
                    field.setAccessible(true);
                    field.set(t, columnVal);
                }
                return t;
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            // å…³é—­èµ„æº
            if (rs != null) {
                try {
                    rs.close();
                } catch (SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
            if (st != null) {
                try {
                    st.close();
                } catch (SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }

            if (conn != null) {
                try {
                    conn.close();
                } catch (SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }

        return null;
    }

}

ä½¿ç”¨PreparedStatement

æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

  • è¯»å–urlã€userã€passwordä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå‡†å¤‡è¿æ¥
  • åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨
  • è·å–è¿æ¥
  • é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œè¿”å›PreparedStatementå®ä¾‹
  • å¡«å……å ä½ç¬¦ps.setString()
  • æ‰§è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼šps.execute()
  • å…³é—­èµ„æºï¼špså’Œconnectionéƒ½è¦å…³é—­ã€‚
import org.junit.Test;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Properties;

public class PreparedStatementUpdateTest {
    @Test
    public void testInsert() {
        Connection conn = null;
        PreparedStatement ps = null;

        try{

            //1. è¯»å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„å››ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
            InputStream is = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");
            Properties pros = new Properties();
            pros.load(is);

            String user = pros.getProperty("user");
            String password = pros.getProperty("password");
            String url = pros.getProperty("url");
            String driverClass = pros.getProperty("driverClass");

            //2, åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨
            Class.forName(driverClass);

            //3. è·å–è¿æ¥
            conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);

            //4ï¼Œé¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œè¿”å›PreparedStatementçš„å®ä¾‹
            String sql = "insert into customers(name, email, birth)values(?,?,?)";
            ps = conn.prepareStatement(sql);

            //5ï¼Œå¡«å……å ä½ç¬¦
            ps.setString(1,"Cherrie");
            ps.setString(2,"chenruoyisz@gmail.com");
            SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
            java.util.Date date = sdf.parse("2021-01-31");
            ps.setDate(3, (java.sql.Date) new Date(date.getTime()));

            //6, æ‰§è¡Œæ“ä½œ
            ps.execute();
        }
        catch (Exception e){
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        finally {
            //7, èµ„æºå…³é—­
            if(ps!=null) {
                try {
                    ps.close();
                } catch (SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
          if(conn != null){
                try {
                    conn.close();
                } catch (SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }

    }
}

entry.title: ğŸ’™ JDBC(1)ï½œè·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„äº”ç§æ–¹æ³•
entry.content:
• è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„äº”ç§æ–¹æ³•
    • æ–¹æ³•1ï¼š Diver -> æ„é€ connectionæ”¾å…¥urlå’Œinfo
    • æ–¹æ³•2: ä½¿ç”¨åå°„åŠ¨æ€è·å–Driverç±»å¯¹è±¡
    • æ–¹æ³•3: ä½¿ç”¨DriverManageræ›¿æ¢Driver
    • æ–¹æ³•4: ä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹æ³•ä¸‰ï¼šå¯ä»¥åªåŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨ï¼Œä¸ç”¨æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ°æ³¨å†Œé©±åŠ¨äº†ã€‚
    • æ–¹æ³•5: finalç‰ˆæœ¬

è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„äº”ç§æ–¹æ³•

Note: ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•ä¸ºäº†çœ‹ç€ç®€ä»‹éƒ½ç”¨äº†throws exceptionï¼Œæœ€å¥½ç”¨try-catchåŒ…ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

æ–¹æ³•1ï¼š Diver -> æ„é€ connectionæ”¾å…¥urlå’Œinfo

- urlåœ¨Driverçš„æºç é‡Œé¢å¯ä»¥æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼š"jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test"
- setPropertyï¼šæ”¾å…¥userå’Œpassword

    @Test
    public void testConnection1() throws Exception {
        Driver driver = new com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver();

        //url: http://localhost:8080/gmall/keyboard.jpg
        //jdbc:mysqlåè®®
        //localhost:ipåœ°å€
        //3306:é»˜è®¤mysqlç«¯å£å·
        //testï¼štestæ•°æ®åº“
        String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";
        //å°†ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç å°è£…åœ¨Propertiesä¸­
        Properties info =new Properties();
        info.setProperty("user","root");
        info.setProperty("password","aaa123");

        Connection conn = driver.connect(url, info);

        System.out.println(conn);
    }

æ–¹æ³•2: ä½¿ç”¨åå°„åŠ¨æ€è·å–Driverç±»å¯¹è±¡

å› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦æ¢æˆOracleæˆ–å…¶ä»–çš„æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åŠ¨æ€çš„å»è°ƒDriverå¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥ä½¿ä»£ç æ›´æœ‰å¯æ‰©å±•æ€§ã€‚

    public void testConnection2() throws Exception {
        //1. è·å–Driverå®ç°ç±»å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åå°„
        Class clazz = Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
        Driver driver = (Driver) clazz.newInstance();

        //2.æä¾›è¦é“¾æ¥çš„æ•°æ®åº“
        String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";

        //3.æä¾›é“¾æ¥éœ€è¦çš„ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        Properties info =new Properties();
        info.setProperty("user","root");
        info.setProperty("password","aaa123");

        //4.è·å–é“¾æ¥
        Connection conn = driver.connect(url, info);
        System.out.println(conn);
    }

æ–¹æ³•3: ä½¿ç”¨DriverManageræ›¿æ¢Driver

    public void testConnection3() throws Exception {
        //1ã€‚è·å–Driverå®ç°ç±»å¯¹è±¡
        Class clazz = Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
        Driver driver = (Driver) clazz.newInstance();

        //2ï¼Œæä¾›å¦å¤–ä¸‰ä¸ªé“¾æ¥çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
        String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";
        String user = "root";
        String password = "aaa123";

        //æ³¨å†Œé©±åŠ¨
        DriverManager.registerDriver(driver);

æ–¹æ³•4: ä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹æ³•ä¸‰ï¼šå¯ä»¥åªåŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨ï¼Œä¸ç”¨æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ°æ³¨å†Œé©±åŠ¨äº†ã€‚

è¿™æ˜¯å› ä¸ºåœ¨è½½å…¥æ—¶å·²ç»æ³¨å†Œäº†ã€‚

    public void testConnection4() throws Exception {

æ–¹æ³•5: finalç‰ˆæœ¬

é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯æœ€å¥½ä¸è¦ä»¥ç¡¬å®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹å¼å†™ï¼Œæœ€å¥½å†™åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶ååŠ è½½è¿›ä»£ç ä¸­ã€‚

  • é…ç½®Properties
    æ³¨æ„ï¼šPropertiesé‡Œå·¦å³ç­‰å·ä¸è¦æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼

user=root
password=aaa123

public void testConnection5() throws Exception {
        //1.è¯»å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„4ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
        InputStream is = ConnectionTest.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");

        Properties pros = new Properties();
        pros.load(is);

        String user = pros.getProperty("user");
        String password = pros.getProperty("password");
        String url = pros.getProperty("url");
        String driverClass = pros.getProperty("driverClass");

        //2.åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨
        Class.forName(driverClass);

        //3.è·å–è¿æ¥
        Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);
        System.out.println(conn);
    }
